datas.product: Sky Watcher Sky-Watcher Flextube 250 SynScan Dobsonian 10-inch Collapsible Computerized GoTo Large Aperture Telescope, White, (S11810)

about_this_item: LARGE APERTURE: Get a bright, bold viewing experience at a fraction of the cost of other optical designs.
INNOVATIVE COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN: Unique strut design allows for optical tube to collapse for ease of portability while keeping collimation.
BUILT-IN WIFI: Control your telescope using a smartphone or tablet with Sky-Watcher's proprietary built-in wifi signal.

ALL METAL GEARING: Using all-metal gearing on a pair of DC servo motors, the SynScan Dobsonian combines the precise automated tracking of a computerized GoTo telescope with the bright large-aperture viewing of a Dobsonian.
94% REFLECTIVE MIRRORS: Fully multi-coated borosilicate primary and secondary mirrors deliver exceptional views.
42,000 OBJECT DATABASE: SynScan hand controller with 42,000 plus object database will keep even the most experienced astronomer busy for countless observing nights.

COMES COMPLETE: All accessories such as, 2-inch Crayford-style focuser with 1 1/4-inch adapter, two super wide-angle eyepieces (25mm and 10mm), and 9x50 straight-through finder scope are included with purchase.
warranty_and_Support: https://www.amazon.comAmazon.com Return Policy  Amazon.com Voluntary 30-Day Return Guarantee: You can return many items you have purchased within 30 days following delivery of the item to you. Our Voluntary 30-Day Return Guarantee does not affect your legal right of withdrawal in any way. You can find out more about the exceptions and conditions here.
details.product_descriptions: Sky-Watcher's GoTo Dobsonian epitomizes Sky-Watcher's dedication to innovative ideas, combining our exclusive collapsible optical tube design with the convenience of a computerized GoTo mount. The SynScan hand controller allows users to point the telescope at specific objects, or tour the night sky with the touch of a button! Most astronomers crave the large aperture of a Dobsonian telescope, yet the lack of computerized GoTo features can be discouraging for some users. Sky-Watcher tackles this by adding motors to a traditional Dobsonian base, giving astronomers the benefits of a computerized GoTo system. Sky-Watcher's signature SynScan hand controller uses two easy alignment methods, ‘Bright Star Alignment' or ‘Two-Star Alignment' for quick and easy setup. Once aligned, the SynScan hand controller can point to over 42,000 objects, including a full catalog of Messier, NGC and IC objects, providing you with a lifetime of celestial observing! While Dobsonian telescopes have a reputation for large apertures at a low cost, they often come at the expense of portability. The GoTo Dobsonian fixes this problem using our exclusive collapsible optical tube, featuring a strut system with three 1 steel poles and chrome locking screws. The strut system uses preset indentations which place the optics in the same position time after time, maintaining collimation. Unlike other Dobsonians using truss-tube systems, Sky-Watcher's GoTo Dobsonian optical tube does not need to be disassembled before transporting from one location to another. With the ability to collapse up to 36%, these optical tubes can be easily transported in the backseat of most vehicles. At the heart of every Sky-Watcher telescope are professional-grade optics. The GoTo Dobsonian is no exception, using borosilicate mirrors coated in quartz, titanium and silicon dioxide. This yields an amazing 94% reflectivity, vivid contrast and minimal vignetting to deliver an exceptional viewing experience. Unlike other manufacturers, Sky-Watcher has a policy of providing you with all necessary accessories to get started. 8, 10 and 12 GoTo Dobsonians include a 2 Crayford-style focuser, with a 1.25 adapter and two 1.25 eyepieces (10mm and 25mm). Whether this is your first telescope or not, there's enough accessories for every kind of astronomer.

datas.product: AXIS P5654-E P56 Network Camera, White

about_this_item: Information Not Available
HDTV 720p with 21x optical zoom
Lightfinder 2.0 and Forensic WDR
Signed firmware and secure boot
Electronic image stabilization
Zipstream with support for H.264 and H.265
details.product_descriptions: AXIS P5654-E PTZ Network Camera is a cost-effective PTZ camera that offers wide area coverage with 77 field of view. Thanks to the newest generation of Axis chip, it offers excellent video quality, even in the most challenging light conditions, and a high level of defense to protect your system. It's ideal for deterrent surveillance of large indoor and outdoor areas and provides great details when zooming in. Great images - anytime AXIS P5654-E offers superb image quality in HDTV 720p with 21x optical zoom. It's got Forensic WDR for clarity even when there's both dark and light areas in the scene. And Lightfinder 2.0 for low-light images with more saturated colors and sharper images of moving objects. Additionally, it has electronic image stabilization (EIS) for stable images despite vibration. And focus recall gives you instant focus in challenging light conditions. Plus, it comes with four scene profiles (indoor, outdoor, forensic and traffic) with different image settings optimized to suit specific scenarios. Keeping you secure This PTZ camera is packed with enhanced security functionality to safeguard your system and prevent unauthorized access. Signed firmware and secure boot guarantees that the firmware hasn't been altered and ensures only authorized firmware is installed. And if needed, secure boot guarantees that the camera is completely free of malware after a factory default. And there's more... This versatile camera with IP66, NEMA 4X and IK10 ratings can handle temperatures ranging from -30C to 50C (-22F to 122F). Based on new generation chip, it offers extended processing power for handling of advanced analytics. And thanks to Axis Zipstream technology with H.264 and H.265 it preserves all the important details while significantly lowering bandwidth and storage requirements.

datas.product: Nikon Z30 Mirrorless Camera with 2 Lens Kit NIKKOR Z DX 16-50mm F3.5-6.3 VR and 50-250mm F4.5-6.3 VR Bundle 1743 w/Deco Gear Photography Backpack + LED + Filter Kit + Tripod + Software & Accessories

datas.product: Fujinon XF8-16mmF2.8R LM WR Lens

about_this_item: Equivalent to 12 - 24mm (35mm)
20 elements in 13 groups, including 4 aspherical Lens elements and 6 ED Lens elements including 3 ED elements to control lateral chromatic aberration
Weather sealed at 11 points
Weather and Dust-Resistant and capable of operating in temperatures as low as 14 Degree/-10 Degree.
details.product_descriptions: The new XF8-16mmF2.8 R LM WR features an optical construction of 20 elements in 13 groups, including 4 aspherical lens elements to control distortion and spherical aberration, and 6 ED lens elements including 3 ED elements to control lateral chromatic aberration, a lens design that produces advanced image-resolving performances across the entire zoom range. Featuring a field curvature correction element that adjusts according to the position of the zoom, the XF8-16mmF2.8 R LM WR achieves edge-to-edge sharpness, correcting field curvature that is typically found with ultra-wide angle lenses. The lens barrel is lightweight yet robust, sealed at 11 points, designed to be weather and Dust-Resistant and capable of operating in temperatures as low as 14 Degree/-10 Degree.

datas.product: [3 Batteries] Autel Robotics EVO II Pro V3, S-ony's 20-megapixel, 1'' CMOS Sensor, 6K Video Resolution, Max ISO 44000, 12-bit DNG, 16X Digital Zoom, F/2.8-F/11 Aperture, Moonlight Algorithm 2.0, 40 MIN Flight Time, No Geo-Fencing, EVO 2 Pro V3 Fly More Combo, 360 Obstacle Avoidance, Skylink 2.0 Transmission, Extra 64 GB SD & 3 Pair of Propellers & Landing Pad & Custom Lens Wipe & ND FILTER SET, (Worth $759) 6.4' Smart Controller SE (Orange)

about_this_item: 🥇🥇🥇🥇🥇【100% ORIGINAL & DUAL AFTER-SALES GUARANTEE】We are a distributor of Autel, and the products we sell are directly from Autel's factory, 100% original. The Autel EVO 2 PRO V3 sold in our store not only supports Autel Store's after-sales service, but also supports USA after-sales warranty service. With the dual after-sale service guarantee and the most cost-effective (save $120 than EVO 2 PRO V3 Bundle with 2 Batteries), this EVO 2 PRO V3 bundle(3 Batteries) is the best choice for you!

👍【2023 NEWEST EVO 2 PRO 6K V3 DRONE, SO-NY CAMERA】Autel Robotics EVO II Pro 6k drone version 3 increased transmission stability. Autel EVO 2 Pro V3 equipped with S~ony's latest 20 megapixels 1-inch CMOS image sensor, can capture video at resolutions up to 6K. With improved dynamic range, noise suppression, and higher frame rates. Additionally, the drone has adjustable aperture range of F2.8~ F11 and maximum ISO of 44000, it is the perfect choice for any aerial cinematographer or mapping pilot.

👍【MOONLIGHT ALGORITHM 2.0 & 4K HDR VIDEO】Autel EVO II Pro V3 with Autel's Moonlight Algorithm 2.0(Max ISO 44000), which provides additional noise reduction for improved image quality. Combined with its upgraded CMOS sensor, it is capable of capturing clear images and video even in low light conditions or at night. EVO II Pro V3 pairs the brilliance of 4K clarity with the brightness, color, and detail of HDR. Previously hidden areas of shadow and sunlight are now full of clarity and detail.

👍【12-BIT A-LOG POST PRODUCTION FLEXIBILITY & DYNAMIC TRACK 2.0】12-bit camera allows Autel EVO 2 Pro V3 to record up to 68.6 billion colors with 64 times the color rendering power of 10-bit (Version 2). EVO II Pro V3 retains rich detail in shadows and highlights, allowing greater flexibility in post-production. It can model the location and speed of targets simultaneously, predict their trajectory accurately and track them continuously while identifying up to 64 objects at the same time.

👍【360 OMNI-DIRECTIONAL OBSTACLE AVOIDANCE】 Autel robotics EVO II 6K camera drone comes with 12 computer vision sensors, 2 sonar sensors, and 2 LED landing lights, working together to create an aircraft with the best obstacle avoidance. This function can help EVO 2 drone around the environment safely.

👍【NO GEO-FENCING IN NO FLY-ZONES】Does this product have geo-fence feature? I believe you can find the answer here. Autel EVO II Pro is still not programmed in no fly zones (NFZ), and Autel Evo 2 pro has no geo-fencing. Autel leaves that responsibility to the pilot to be aware of any rules and regulations in the area so Please fly legally! NOTE: EVO II Pro V3 does not need to be on the latest firmware or app version in order to take off.

👍【EVO II PRO V3 COMBO INCLUDES】1* Ready-to-go EVO II pro drone(1*Battery, 2 Pair * EVO 2 propellers, 1* gimbal holder, 1* 32G SD), 1* Smart Controller SE, extra 2* battery, extra 4 pair * propellers, 1* extra 64G SD, 1* ND FILTER SET, 1 pair *Spare Control Stick, 1* Custom Lens Wipe, 1 * Landing Pad, 1* Hard Carry Case, etc. This bundle is backed by 30 Days REPLACEMENT or FULL REFUND, 12 Months free from defects services. details.product_descriptions: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

datas.product: 16X9 Inc Easyrig Easyrig MiniMax Camera Support System, 4.4 to 15.4 lbs Load Capacity

about_this_item: Load Capacity: 4.4 - 15.4lbs (2 - 6.99kg)
details.product_descriptions: Easyrig has redesigned two models of the Easyrig Mini into one complete new product, the Easyrig MiniMax. Strong & Compact The new Easyrig MiniMax has a range of 4.4 to 15.4lbs (2-7kg) and features an all new overload protection system. If the Easyrig MiniMax spring system is overloaded, the Tripping Mechanism will ensure the internal spring system is not damaged due to the heavy load. Redesigning the Mini The new spring system Easyrig developed has resulted in a smoother rope force. The construction of a conical wheel that unrolls the rope allows for the new feature. Easyrig has also reduced the friction through the entire support process in the new MiniMax resulting in a much more fluid feel and operation.

details.product_descriptions: The LUMIX S1H is a full-frame mirrorless camera for film production scaled to a hand-held design without compromising professional-level standards It offers extensive recording modes and cinematic image quality to meet the high demands of today's creators With superior functionality that slots effortlessly into the professional workflow the S1H is also designed for active filming in the field when attached to a gimbal or drone A newly developed 24 2-megapixel full-frame image sensor complies with the new Dual Native ISO In combination with the optimum signal processing by Venus Engine it achieves high sensitivity and minimum noise The LUMIX S1H provides 14+ stops of dynamic range which is as wide as those of cinema cameras and V-Log / V-Gamut compatible with popular calorimetry called Verica Look  What makes the LUMIX S1H a special camera is an unlimited recording time in all recording modes thanks to unique heat dispersion technologies HDR (High Dynamic Range) in HLG (Hybrid Log Gamma) 4 2 2 10-bit internal recording and output through HDMI Anamorphic 4 3 modes are also available together with a variety of practical tools for film making such as tally lights a waveform monitor and a V-Log View Assist function (LUT Viewer) The LUMIX S1H full-frame mirrorless camera system adopts the L-Mount system to provide users with a diverse and future-proof range of products Currently more than 46 interchangeable lenses including 11 or more LUMIX S/S PRO lenses are available or will be available from Panasonic Leica Camera and Sigma to choose from and a variety of mount adapters/converters further expand the opportunities to use even more lenses The L-Mount thereby opens up an almost limitless spectrum of new creative possibilities The LUMIX S1H combines cinema industry performance refined by Panasonic with the high mobility and functionality of LUMIX mirrorless cameras.

datas.product: Sigma 135mm f/1.8 DG HSM Art Lens for Canon EF (240954)

about_this_item: A new large Hyper Sonic Motor (HSM) delivers ample torque to the focusing group for outstanding speed, ensuring exceptionally stable performance even at lower speeds
This state-of-the-art prime lens touts a dust and splash proof mount for guaranteed performance in any condition and its large 1.8 aperture allows for more creative control over imagery.
A stunning compression effect makes the Sigma 135mm F1.8 Art the ideal portrait lens while its large aperture help with event photography and much more.
Like each and every Global Vision Lens, the Sigma 135mm F1.8 DG HSM Art is handcrafted at our single factory in Aizu, Japan and undergoes individual evaluation before leaving Sigma's facility.
details.product_descriptions: The Sigma 135mm F1.8 DG HSM Art is a medium range telephoto prime lens designed for modern high megapixel DSLRs.

datas.product: [Newest] 360 Photo Booth Machine for Parties, 360 Video Booth Machine for Live Streaming Wedding Birthday Events Exhibitions,Free Custom Logo, APP/Remote Control (39.4' PRO for 1-5 People+Flight Case)

about_this_item: [Free Logo Customization and Extra Parts] We offer free Logo customization and extra parts if you need them, contact us via AMZ, or scan the QR code on product Description to get our official EM, and leave a message stating your needs. Then we will deliver it to you . Being able to get your logo on the platform will go a long way in helping your brand name get out there.

[Advanced Acrylic Light Box: Durable and stylish] The light box of our video booth machine is made of sturdy acrylic material with around 40 color modes, bright colors, long service life, no need to install, and no extra power needed. In addition, Acrylic material is widely used for modern advertising and has become the highlight. As for other brands, you need to cut and stick the light strip to the video booth, and an extra power supply is also needed.

[Upgraded RGB Ring Light: 18 color modes] The ring light of our 360 video booth features 18 RGB color modes (6 monochrome static modes + 12 dynamic modes) with even light distribution and no shadows, as well as 10 different brightness levels to choose from. Compared to other brands with only 3 color modes, our colorful RGB ring light creates a mysterious and magical atmosphere, bringing infinite inspiration to your video creation.

[Innovative design: 2-in-1 remote control & the latest angle adjuster] To save the trouble of using two remote controls like other brands, our company has designed this 2-in-1 remote control. In addition, we also provide 2 of them so that you can have one as a backup. As for the angle adjuster, We have simplified its use, so you only need to rotate it to adjust the angle. For other brands, however, you need to remove the set screws and reinstall them to change the angle.

[APP & hand-held remote control] Two control methods, through the button or APP (yTok) can wirelessly control the 360 photo booth's robotic arm and lightbox. Including the rotation speed, direction and rotation time of the robot arm, and also can be started at a certain speed, control the color change of the lightbox, brightness, and even be set to change the color automatically.

[Long Life and Easy Installation] Equipped with a pressure-resistant high-strength galvanized stage, stable performance motor, aluminum telescopic pole, etc, our 360 Photo Booth Machine can withstand repeated usage. As for setup, Our product page has installation and usage videos, or you can scan the QR Code on the manual to install it step by step. Say goodbye to complicated installation.

[Quality Assurance and 5-year warranty] Promise a 5-year warranty on our 360 photo booths. if you have any questions, we will help you solve it or even send you a new one. NOTE: the RGB Ring Light needs to be powered by a power bank which is not included in the package due to shipping restrictions, please contact us to get a free one if you need it.

X-T5 enhances mobility for capturing life's precious moments with its compact and lightweight body, weighing only 557g
The camera's three top-plate dials control ISO, shutter speed, and exposure compensation, providing easy operation and allowing for confident, concentrated image-making

details.product_descriptions: - X-T5 Mirrorless Digital Camera -Comparable in size to the original X-T1 and 50g lighter than its predecessor, X-T5 features the latest high-resolution, 40-megapixel X-Trans 5 HR sensor for simply stunning results. Quick and easy to use thanks to its classic, dial-based layout, the camera features cutting-edge technology. This includes a seven-stop in-body image stabilization system, Pixel Shift Multi-Shot mode for 160-megapixel files, three-way tilting LCD with 1.84 million pixels and action-freezing shutter speeds up to 1/180,000 sec from the electronic shutter.In addition to its versatile suite of stills capabilities, X-T5 is also a highly capable moviemaking machine, recording up to 6.2K in 4:2:2 10-bit color internally - or 12-bit Apple ProRes RAW and Blackmagic RAW via HDMI.Big Resolution, Compact DimensionsOffering the ultimate image quality, X-T5 features the class-leading, 40.2-megapixel X-Trans 5 HR CMOS sensor in a compact, lightweight body that maximizes functionality and portability. Imaging performance is in no way compromised by the camera's diminutive proportions. Instead, X-T5's improved image processing algorithm delivers outstanding results, packed with detail right across the native ISO range, which now extends to ISO 125.The classic X Series design has been retained. Dials predominate, making key functions - including ISO, shutter speed and exposure compensation - quick and easy to set, even with the came

datas.product: CASIRIS A6 Ultra Short Throw Projector, Triple Laser Projector 2200 ANSI Lumen, 4K UHD Laser TV with Android TV, HDR10 120' Projection, 107% BT.2020, UST Projector for Home Theater

about_this_item: 【Triple Laser Tech】CASIRIS A6 adopts the most advanced triple laser light optical technology, using pure RGB lasers to deliver the colors directly, achieving 107% coverage of the BT. 2020 color gamut which is 202% Rec.709 and 149% DCI-P3 color space. Compared to most UST laser projectors on the market that use single chip blue laser DLP with a color wheel to generate the colorful image, triple laser systems offer significantly greater color space and uniformity.

【The Most Realistic Experience】Pure RGB light sources bring 1.07 billion color display, presenting you unparalleled cinematic experience with realism and vivid images. With just a pair of active shutter 3D glasses, you can enjoy an immersive 3D movie experience right in the comfort of your home ( NOTE: 3D system is ready, please contact us if you want to update the 3D).

【Incredible Detail Display】 Movie comes alive with HDR10 technology and 8.3 million pixels. The high-dynamic range enriches details in the highlights and shadows, allowing you to enjoy every scene as if you was seen with your own eyes . You'll be able to see the shape of every snowflake on the snow, as well as every sparkling stars in the night sky. With a true 4K UHD resolution and 2200 ANSI Lumen, you can see clear images even during the day.

【Immersive Sound】Dolby Atmos and DTS audio technologies captivate your senses with lifelike sound above that completely immerses you in the world of your entertainment. Whether it is the sound of gunfights in the game, the sound of wind and rain in the movie, or the shouting in the sports, it will be transmitted to your ears from all directions of your room, bringing an optical illusion to your ears, just like you were there in person. Moreover, the noise of the smart projector is only 28 dB.

【Ultra Space Saving】 CASIRIS UST projector with 0.25:1 ultra short throw ratio, just place the projector at a distance of 11.7 inches from the screen and you can get a 120' large picture. Save almost as much space as a TV, but get a bigger screen and better viewing experience.

specification.Special Feature: Triple Laser Tech, 107% BT.2020, 80-150 Image Size, Dolby Atmos, 4K UHD, Active 3D, HDR 10, HDMI eARC, Android TV 10.0, MEMC, 8-Point Keystone Correction, Eletric Focus, Ultra Short Throw See more
